Name: Bar Roseval
Review Text: Came here only for a beer, really enjoyed the seats outside and the view of the church tower gives it a even cosier look. Checked the menu and they also even some vegetarian options, therefore I think I will come back to taste the food as well!

Name: Bar Roseval
Review Text: This place is missing gezelligheid. It's just not really cozy, which is a big miss considering they could fill a big void in the neighborhood! They have a lovely terrace though!
